Package controllers

Class HomeController

java.lang.Object
play.mvc.Results
play.mvc.Controller
controllers.HomeController
All Implemented Interfaces:
play.libs.ws.DefaultBodyReadables, play.libs.ws.DefaultBodyWritables, play.libs.ws.JsonBodyReadables, play.libs.ws.JsonBodyWritables, play.libs.ws.WSBodyReadables, play.libs.ws.WSBodyWritables, play.libs.ws.XMLBodyReadables, play.libs.ws.XMLBodyWritables, play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status
public class HomeController
extends play.mvc.Controller
implements play.libs.ws.WSBodyReadables, play.libs.ws.WSBodyWritables
This controller contains an action to handle HTTP requests to the application's home page.
Author:
Saghana Mahesh Sarma, Sumit Ramesh Bhiungade, Jai Sahni

  • Method Details

    • index

      public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<play.mvc.Result> index​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
      An action that renders an HTML page with the index page . The configuration in the routes file means that this method will be called when the application receives a GET request with a path of /.

    • search

      public play.mvc.Result search​(java.lang.String query, play.mvc.Http.Request request)
      This controller method will be used to take in a search term, perform a lookup, add that to cache and then redirect to index page.
      Parameters:
      query - The search term for which we need to fetch posts from Reddit
      request - Http.Request
      Returns:
      Result

    • searchUser

      public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<play.mvc.Result> searchUser​(java.lang.String user, play.mvc.Http.Request request)
      This controller method will be used to take in a user id and helps in retrieving owner information and then return a new view
      Parameters:
      user - The user id to get the details of the author of a reddit
      Returns:
      Result

    • searchThread

      public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<play.mvc.Result> searchThread​(java.lang.String subreddit, play.mvc.Http.Request request)
      This controller method will be used to take in a subreddit and helps in retrieving reddit posts under that particular subreddit and then return a new view
      Parameters:
      subreddit - The subreddit for which the reddits need to be fetched.
      Returns:
      Result

    • searchStats

      public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<play.mvc.Result> searchStats​(java.lang.String query, play.mvc.Http.Request request)
      This controller method will be used to perform word stats on a given search query . and then return a new view
      Parameters:
      query - The query on which the word stats need to be performed
      Returns:
      Result
